name: Star Hunter VR
description: Star Hunter VR is an Science Fiction hunting game, Experience fast paced hunting action in Science Fiction World. Explore of varied terrain, ranging from dense forests to lush valleys and Terror Valley or Desert.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 5 GB available space
